title: Gluten Free Double Stuf Oreo Review - Oreo Oration
description:
This is the end... for now. Greg actually intended to record more episodes but the amount of sugar he consumed in the past four episodes put him into a midday slumber. Anyways, here's the episode all of you have been asking for. I'm sure it's not going to make anybody with a Gluten allergy mad in the comments!

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
